name: BlazBlue: Chrono Phantasma
overview: BlazBlue: Chrono Phantasma, released in Japan as BlazBlue: Chronophantasma (?????? ????????? BureiBuru Kuronofantazuma?), is a 2-D fighting game developed by Arc System Works. It is the third game of the Blazblue series, set after the events of BlazBlue: Continuum Shift. The game was originally to be released first as an arcade game in the early fourth quarter of 2012
